egov-security:config.jdbcUsersByUsernameQuery: SELECT USS_ID AS USER_ID, USS_PWD AS PASSWORD, 1 ENABLED , USS_NM AS USER_NM, 'dd' USER_ZIP, 'dss' USER_ADRES, 'ee@letech.kr' AS USER_EMAIL, 'GNR' USER_SE, 'sss' ORGNZT_ID, 'aaa' ESNTL_ID, 'ddd' ORGNZT_NM FROM STD_USS_MNG WHERE USS_ID = ?
egov-security:config.jdbcAuthoritiesByUsernameQuery: SELECT A.USS_ID AS USER_ID, B.AUTHOR_CODE AS AUTHORITY FROM STD_USS_MNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN STD_AUT_ROLE_MAP B ON (A.USS_ID = B.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID) WHERE A.USS_ID = ?

egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlHierarchicalRoles: SELECT CHLDRN_ROLE child, PARNTS_ROLE parent FROM STD_AUT_ROLE_HIC
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndUrl: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN url, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM STD_AUT_ROLE_INFO a, STD_AUT_ROLE_RELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'url' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndMethod: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN method, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM STD_AUT_ROLE_INFO a, STD_AUT_ROLE_RELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'method' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndPointcut: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN pointcut, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM STD_AUT_ROLE_INFO a, STD_AUT_ROLE_RELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'pointcut' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRegexMatchedRequestMapping: SELECT a.resource_pattern uri, b.authority authority FROM COMTNSECURED_RESOURCES a, COMTNSECURED_RESOURCES_ROLE b WHERE a.resource_id = b.resource_id AND a.resource_type = 'url'
